radiographic_examinations.findings: Diffuse pachymeningeal enhancement and brain sagging.
Opening pressure of 8 cm H2O and an extensive thoracic CSF leak.
Parietal homogenously enhancing dural-based mass consistent with meningioma.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: MRI 6 months later showed the appearance of diffuse pachymeningeal enhancement.
Gradual resolution of the pachymeningeal enhancement.
Gradual resolution of the pachymeningeal enhancement.

radiographic_examinations.findings: Diffuse pachymeningeal enhancement and sagging of the brain.
